description: Aspose.Imaging for .NET is an imaging library that lets developers create, edit, draw or convert images in their .NET applications. Aspose.Imaging provides features that go beyond the native capabilities of the development platform. It works independent of other applications and although Aspose.Imaging allows you to save to Adobe PhotoShop® format (PSD), you do not need PhotoShop on the machine.
releaseNotes:
Aspose.Imaging for .Net has been updated to version 2.4.0 and we are pleased to announce it.
      The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.Imaging.

      Major Features
      We are happy to announce that a long awaited feature (IMAGING-32164) of Dwg to Pdf conversion is now available. Now we support reading and conversion to Pdf of the Autocad 2004 Dwg file format (version 16.0 Release 18). We continue the hard work to support the other Autocad versions and Autocad 2010 support is currently under development. Please note we currently support the following main Autocad 2004 primitives: TEXT, MTEXT, ATTDEF, ATTRIB, ARC, ELLIPSE, HATCH, LEADER, POINT, VERTEX 2D, VERTEX 3D, POLYLINE 2D, LWPOLYLINE, RAY, CIRCLE, DIMENSION ORDINATE, DIMENSION LINEAR, DIMENSION ALIGNED, DIMENSION ANG 3Pt, DIMENSION ANG 2Ln, DIMENSION RADIUS, DIMENSION DIAMETER, SHAPE, SOLID, SPLINE, MLINE, LINE, XLINE, STYLE, DIMSTYLE, LTYPE, MLINESTYLE, LAYER, VIEWPORT, LAYOUT.
      Additionally we have greatly reworked the Imaging engine and improved the overall performance for bmp file format (IMAGING-34110). The bmp file format now supports raw data loading and processing of the bmp file format is now greatly improved. We will continue the raw data support and future releases will contain more file formats covering that feature.

      Other Improvements and Changes
      New features:
      IMAGING-34045 [Dwg to Pdf] Add support of rendering of specified layout
      IMAGING-33962 Add thumbnail support to JFIF and EXIF

      Enhancements:
      IMAGING-33958 [Dxf to Pdf] Parse custom visibility parameter for insert object
      IMAGING-34066 Saved JPEG images differ from source images
      IMAGING-34067 JpegImage.LoadPixels throws System.Exception: Unexpected marker
      IMAGING-34097 [Dxf to Pdf] Rotated texts fix
      IMAGING-34105 [Cad] Remove Cad special data types (such as CadShortParameter)
      IMAGING-34007 [Cad to Pdf] Implement adjustments for ATTDEF objects
      IMAGING-34001 Text in AttribDef object must be unvisible.
      IMAGING-34024 Add support for underline text rendering for multitext entity
      IMAGING-34079 Moving internal members to public - should be accessible via public api
      IMAGING-34053 Moving public members to internal - should not be accessible via public api
      IMAGING-34078 Process hangs when opens Tiff file
      IMAGING-34068 JpegImage.LoadPixels throws System.IndexOutOfRangeException
      IMAGING-34051 [Cad to Pdf] Hatch object is absent on a drawing
      IMAGING-34101 [Cad to Pdf] Fix viewports rendering
      IMAGING-34036 Improve colorization and interval between lines
      IMAGING-34111 Exception while exporting the Jpeg to Tiff: "An attempt was made to move the position before the beginning of the stream."
      IMAGING-34102 Cannot encode large tiff image correctly using CCITT scheme
      IMAGING-34069 Metadata segments allow to write thumbnails big enough to overap upper size boundary of jpeg segment.
      IMAGING-34094 ImageLoadException: Image loading failed while loading a multi-page Tiff image
      IMAGING-34039 ImageLoadException: Image loading failed while loading a Tiff Image
summary: Aspose.Imaging for .NET is an imaging library that lets developers create, edit, draw or convert images in their .NET applications. Aspose.Imaging provides features that go beyond the native capabilities of the development platform. It works independent of other applications and although Aspose.Imaging allows you to save to Adobe PhotoShop® format (PSD), you do not need PhotoShop on the machine.
title: Aspose.Imaging for .NET
